rooms.name: entrance hall
rooms.description: Welcome area with ample lighting and storage space. Vastu-aligned to the east for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: living room
rooms.description: Open space with Mediterranean style decor, natural light streaming from north-facing windows.

rooms.name: dining area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for family gatherings. Windows oriented towards east/northeast following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances and Mediterranean aesthetic; located on the west side to accommodate a large pantry and prep area, keeping in mind Vastu for water elements placement.

rooms.name: master bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom featuring a private balcony facing north for calmness and enhanced airflow. Includes built-in wardrobes along the west wall.

rooms.name: childroom1
rooms.description: Cozy room with ample storage and space for study, also has a small private balcony on the east side for morning sunlight in accordance with Vastu.

rooms.name: childroom2
rooms.description: Functional bedroom design with sufficient storage and a personal balcony facing south to maintain balance as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: library
rooms.description: Dedicated library area featuring built-in shelves, comfortable seating, and ample natural light from north-facing windows. This room is positioned for quiet reading while integrating with the living space.

openings.name: main entrance
openings.description: Provides direct access to the entrance hall, ensuring easy navigation and a welcoming atmosphere.

openings.name: living room window
openings.description: Large windows offering scenic views and abundant natural light, following Vastu recommendations for east and south exposures.

openings.name: balcony openings
openings.description: Each bedroom features a spacious balcony with privacy screens; master bedroom balcony faces north, childrooms have east and south balconies respectively to balance energy flow.

openings.name: rooftop terrace access
openings.description: Staircase leading directly to the rooftop terrace ensuring easy access and integration with the main living area. The terrace features Mediterranean landscaping elements, an outdoor seating area, and a pergola.

notes.plot_orientation: West-facing plot ensures that sunlight is maximized during the early part of the day; design integrates Vastu principles by allocating water-related activities in appropriate zones.
notes.vastu_compliance: Rooms are arranged with north, east, and south exposures prioritized for living areas, while west is used for functional spaces like kitchens. Balconies are strategically placed to allow energy flow.
